overview: A young pacifist after refusing on principle to defend her sweetheart's honor and being banished in disgrace, joins a riverboat troupe as a singer, acquires a reputation as a crackshot after a saloon brawl in which the villain of the piece accidentally kills himself with his own gun, falls in love with his former fiance√©'s sister and finally bullies an apprehensive family into accepting him.
tagline: SAIL AWAY ON A CRUISE OF MERRIMENT & MELODY
title: Mississippi
